      • registerFlavors

        public void registerFlavors(JavaLibraryDescription.Arg arg,
                   BuildRule buildRule,
                   ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem,
                   RuleKeyBuilderFactory ruleKeyBuilderFactory,
                   BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver)
        A registers a JavaLibrary.GWT_MODULE_FLAVOR, if appropriate.
        Specified by:
        registerFlavors in interface FlavorableDescription<JavaLibraryDescription.Arg>
        Parameters:
        arg - used to create the described rule.
        buildRule - rule being flavored: has not been registered with ruleResolver yet.
        projectFilesystem - available to help construct a BuildRuleParams.
        ruleKeyBuilderFactory - available to help construct a BuildRuleParams.
        ruleResolver - with which new flavors introduced by this method should be registered.
